body_content.explanation: to please someone by giving them what they want or need:
examples: They have 31 flavours of ice cream - enough to satisfy everyone!
Come on, satisfy my curiosity (= tell me what I want to know) - what happened last night?

body_content.explanation: to have or provide something that is needed or wanted:
examples: She satisfies all the requirements for the job.

body_content.explanation: to make someone believe that something is true:
examples: I satisfied myself (that) I had locked the door.
The authorities were satisfied of (= they accepted) the seriousness of his situation.
